name: Office Chaos (itch)
description:
Something went wrong at the office... It's Office Chaos!

The office equipment has come to life, and are hunting you down! Make your way through a series of challenging rooms, avoiding paper cuts and staples, to get to the evil boss' office and take him down once and for all! You'd better watch out, though, something's not quite right with him...

This dungeon crawler style game was made for the Brackey's GameJam 2021.2, given the theme "Let there be Chaos".

Controls:

- WASD to move around

- Left click to shoot
